name: lighthouse-dashboard
description: Analyze and produce reports for website optimization using Google Lighthouse automation

scripts.merge-dev:master: git checkout master && git merge dev
scripts.merge-dev:staging: git checkout staging && git merge dev
scripts.merge-staging:heroku: git checkout heroku && git merge staging
scripts.merge-staging:netlify: git checkout netlify && git merge staging
scripts.release:heroku: git subtree push --prefix server heroku master && git checkout staging
scripts.release:netlify: git push origin netlify && git checkout staging

author: Jeremy Bratcher
